messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group of 21 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, and Reza. Sara is connected to Pari, Pam, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Zack is connected to Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia, Ming, and Prem. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Moin is connected to Puja, Pari, Kim, and Ian. Ming is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, Amy, and Gia. Wei is connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva. Kim is connected to Ian, Puja, and Pari. Ian is connected to Puja and Pari. Gia is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, and Amy. Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing. Puja is connected to scholars Pari. Prem is connected to Matt, Eva, and Amy. Wim is connected to Jing. Pari is connected to Amy. Amy is connected to Matt. Matt is connected to Eva. You have been told that Prem is donating 50 books and Moin is donating 10 books. Now, from Amir what is the shortest path to the person with the maximum number of books? Remember that you can take books only from one person. Starting from Amir, please list the scholar names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

user: Amir Moin Reza Jing Wei Raj Puja Wim Kim Ian Kim Reza Amy Pari Gia Eva Matt Prem Gia Prem Matt Amy Prem Nisha Reza Ian Matt Amy Eva Gia Puja Kim Pari Gia Amy Moin Prem Jing Pari Prem Amir Reza Kim Ian
What is the shortest path from Puja to Amir?
Pam Moin
Puja Kim
user: Puja Matt Nisha Gia Matt Puja
You are looking up a document for a legal case, where part of the law text is a question for the court. You would like the case to be reviewed if the answer to the question is "yes". You know all of the following information about the case.
Lawsuit no. 5000.
Title of lawsuit is "Rachel vs. Eric."
Rachel is the claimant.
Eric is the respondent.
Lawsuit type is criminal.
Case was filed in 2005 before the court.
In this case, Rachel and Eric are related to each other. And it is the first time for them to be in the court regarding this case. The case is filed for the murder of the son of Rachel by Eric. The question stated in the case is whether Rachel bears the culpability in this case.
user: Which of the following statements is true? "Pam is the only one among the claimants who has ever filed lawsuits in the court?" "Among the respondents, Eric is the only one who filed no lawsuits before." What is the lawsuit no. for Rachel? What is the murder crime involved?
Lawsuit number
user: Lawsuit 5001. Murder of rape.
After reviewing the lawsuit, it can be found that there is a missing piece of information. It's an important piece of information to find the answer to a question stated above. It is required to find this information.
user: In Eric's record, which of the following statements are true? "Eric is not a lawyer. And he's a student in his second year." "The record shows that a warrant on this person's body was issued three months ago when he was accused of smuggling."
Lawyer "No" Smuggling "Yes"

What is the shortest path from Puja to Amir?
Pam Moin
Puja Kim
